attributes.description:
Finance can be arranged, Excludes administration, delivery and license registration fees, 80 point quality check, Very neat, Trade-ins accepted, Test drives welcome, Nationwide delivery.

Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our Bistro. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Motus Toyota Bryanston.

attributes.description:
A compact and modern design makes the KIA Picanto perfect for your day-to-day urban driving.
Refreshing design
KIA have taken contemporary design to a new level in the Picanto! Combining a modern honeycomb grille with futuristic backward-swept lights, the design makes it stand out from other hatchbacks in its class. A compact build allows the KIA Picanto to fit in well with any inner-city environment, which invites you to drive with confidence.
Obsessed with peace of mind
From its sturdy frame to the latest in sensor technology, the Picanto is dedicated to protecting you when trouble happens and helps you avoid tricky situations in the first place
.

True Style lies within

It may be a compact car, but the Picanto’ s stylish interior gives you all the space you need to dash about town in comfort. And with ergonomically sound layout that places controls for driving, entertainment and temperature control at your fingertips, you'll never have to take your eyes off the road.
